resources.string: Hi, my name is Xintong. I am a experienced Android Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the financial and wireless industry. I have hands on experience in Node.js/JavaScript for data manipulation in Microsoft SQL. Skilled in Java, Node.js, and C++.

SUN LIFE
 Mobile Developer | Montr√©al, Quebec | March 2020 - Present
 * Developed the Provider Search Framework, Marketplace offers and Document Center in my Sun Life app with native mobile development on Android (Java and Kotlin).
 * Developing virtual visits filter in Provider Search Framework to allow users to filter for providers who offer virtual service.
 * Building the document center to digitalized insurance and investment documents, which allow users to view, download, and share documents.
 * Creating usage analytics tracking by using Adobe Analytics and Member Usage Metrics (MUM).
